title: In an email, if someone writes 'Hi' instead of 'Dear,' is that informal? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technically, yes, it is informal. However, at least in the United States, it is quite customary in business communication, especially after the first email or two between routine correspondants. You should not use if you are introducing yourself for the first time, making a formal application, or responding to a formal complaint.
